bibl.title: Roman Army Pay Scales.
bibl.note: I. The Literary and Papyrological Evidence. - II. A New Pay Record on a Writing-Tablet from Vindonissa. - III. The First-Century Pay Scales. - IV. The New Masada Pay Record (P. SPEIDEL M. Alexander, Roman Army Pay Scales.
